mapper.select:
select a.FACTORY, a.PLACE, a.EQUIPMENT, a.TEMPERATURE, a.HUMIDITY, a.CLEANLINESS from HUMITUREDATA a where
a.FACTORY=#{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * from HUMITUREDATA where FACTORY = #{FACTORY} and PLACE = #{PLACE} and EQUIPMENT = #{EQUIPMENT} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HUMITUREDATA (FACTORY, PLACE, EQUIPMENT, TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, CLEANLINESS, DATADATE ,CREATEDATE) VALUES (#{FACTORY},#{PLACE},#{EQUIPMENT},#{TEMPERATURE},#{HUMIDITY},#{CLEANLINESS},#{DATADATE},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE HUMITUREDATA SET TEMPERATURE = #{TEMPERATURE} , HUMIDITY = #{HUMIDITY}, CLEANLINESS = #{CLEANLINESS}, CREATEDATE = sysdate WHERE FACTORY = #{FACTORY} and PLACE = #{PLACE} and EQUIPMENT = #{EQUIPMENT} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
